titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to codify the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to issue regulations covering the practice of enrolled agents before the Internal Revenue Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/18/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to prescribe regulations covering the practice of enrolled agents before the Internal Revenue Service.
